astrology_card.title: The Astrology - My Personal Ideas
astrology_card.description: Astrology is a collection of my ideas and personal projects. I like to built things in my spare time. Writing computer programs is a great way to build things. However, engineering is more than software...
astrology_card.caption: Lights, New York City

events.name: Taurus
events.summary: A windows PE application to backup/restore system images.

events.name: Gemini
events.summary: A set of small programs doing small things.

events.name: Libra
events.summary: A universal Windows platform app for viewing/annotating PDFs.

events.name: Sagittarius
events.summary: An Adobe Lightroom plugin to GeoTag photos with Google location history data.

events.name: Capricorn
events.summary: Snake, the once-popular game in grandfather's Nokia cellphone.

application_card.title: Application Projects
application_card.description: I worked with different people to implement various applications, like database, or websites. These projects are usually more reliable and intended to improve the productivity.
application_card.caption: Montauk Point, NY

events.title: CrowdSeq, Annotating Genes and Variants
events.summary: This project consist of a database, a web server, a set of REST APIs and mobile apps (iOS and Android). It allow users search for genes/variants, view the existing anntations and add their own annotations. The annotations are generally based on the studies between genes, variants and diseases.

events.title: Database for Genomic Sequencing and Analysis
events.summary: This project develops a database, web interface and APIs for tracking patient samples throughout genomic sequencing and analysis process.

events.title: Pathology Data Collection and Review System
events.summary: We developed a web-based approach to pathology review that enables the integration of pathology data including high resolution images, reports and genomics data in a single easy to use resource.

events.title: Database for Appraisal Business
events.summary: Developed a Microsoft Access database (with VBA) to replace an IBM approach database.

events.title: ABET Accreditation Document Database
events.summary: Developed curriculum database with Microsoft Access, SQL and VBA scripts to store curriculum data and documents.

research_card.title: Research Projects
research_card.description: Being in the school for a long time, I also work on exploratory projects. These projects may not become applications eventually. However, they help us explore the unknown territories
research_card.caption: Arecibo Observatory, PR

events.title: Smart Grid Reliability
events.summary: This project investigated the modeling, simulation and control of eletric power systems, including both the distribution and transmission systems. For the distribution system, we worked with the data from New York State Electric & Gas (NYSEG) to identify critical locations for installing power switching equipments. For the transmission system, we built hybrid simulation to incorporate discrete events and the fluctuations continuous states. Based on the simulation model, we designed fault diagnosis algorithm and proposed a data-driven decision making model to improve the reliability.

events.title: Modeling and Simulation of Pedestrians
events.summary: This project integrates perception, cognitive control, path planning, reactive movement appearance and characteristics components in an agent model. With the agent-based simulation, We reproduced several self-emerge phenomena of pedestrian flows in public environment.

events.title: Distributed Simulation in Vehicle Manufacturing
events.summary: This project investigated the network communication protocols, data transfer and data conversion between different commercial software.
